quotes.quote: A new year, a new adventure. Happy birthday!
Happy Birthday! You truly deserve all the best that the Universe has to offer.
The world is a little bit brighter because of you. Happy birthday buddy!
The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Thinking of you on your birthday, and wishing you all the best! I hope it is as fantastic as you are!
Happy Birthday! Here's hoping you enjoy a day that's all about you.
Happy birthday! Can you believe we used to think people our age were adults and had their life in order?
I hope that all your wishes come true. Happy birthday.
May your birthday be as special and wonderful as you are.
Another candle in the cake, another wonderful year ahead. Happy Birthday!
Happy Birthday to my amazing, beautiful, and fabulous best friend.
The older you get the better you get, unless you are a banana.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: Cheers to another trip around the sun. Keep shining, and have a great birthday!
Heads up! Catch that smile! It's from me to you. Happy birthday.
The world is a better place since you've been in it. Happy Birthday!
May all the joy you have spread around come back to you a hundredfold. Happy birthday.
Count not the candles... See the lights they give. Count not the years, but the life you live. Happy birthday!
Break out the cake and noise makers, it's time to celebrate your birthday!
Thank you for making the world a better, happier place! Happy Birthday!
Happy Birthday! You deserve to have all of your dreams come true.
Hope life is absolutely spoiling you with love and happiness. May this next year be the best yet!
May your special day bring you memories and smiles for years to come. Happy Birthday!
Happy Birthday! Here's to another year of you being your wonderful self.
Cake for dinner and champagne for dessert, celebrate your birthday in style!
I wish you a birthday as amazing as you are!
Every day you sparkle but today you rule! Happy Birthday!
All of us wish you a day filled with happiness and a joyous year ahead. Happy birthday!
Wishing you happiness and love, on your birthday and always.
May your birthday mark the beginning of a wonderful period of time in your life!
I learned the meaning of true friendship from you. Happy birthday my friend. Always going to be there for you.
Happy Birthday! Here's to another year of being fun, fabulous you!
May all of your wishes come true this year. Happy Birthday!
Happy Birthday! Cheers to you and your dreams, hopes, and wishes.
Cheers to you and your coming year. Happy Birthday!
May your day be filled with wonderful people and delicious cake. Happy Birthday!
Today, you are not just a year older but have become a little wiser also. Wishing you a happy birthday.
Wishing you much love and happiness, on your birthday and always.
Happy Birthday! May the coming year be filled with love and adventures.
Wishing you a birthday filled with happy times and your favorite people.
New year. New dreams. New adventures. Happy Birthday!
May your birthday be extra special this year.
Happy birthday, and may the Universe bless you with love, prosperity, and happiness all year.
Having you as my friend is a privilege to me. Happy birthday. You are precious.
May the Universe fill your birthday with the magic you deserve.
Best friends are like presents. You are always happy to see them. Happy birthday to the best present that life has given me.
Happy birthday, and may the coming year bring you the sweet rewards you've worked for.
Wishing you the happiest of birthdays, because you deserve it!
Smiling memories and laughter with friends, may your birthday bring you happiness that never ends.
Wishing you greatest birthday ever, full of love and joy from the moment you open your eyes in the morning until you sleep for the night.
Have a wonderful, happy, healthy birthday now and forever.
